  • Classes in com.bit6.sdk used by com.bit6.sdk

    Address 
    Bit6
    Bit6 is for interaction between the Bit6 framework and application

    MessageStatusListener
    Interface to get status changes for sent messages.
    NotificationClient 
    NotificationClient.Listener
    Interface to add on Bit6 instance in order to get updates if new message or notification (typing and message update) arrives.
    Prefs
    The class is for setting and getting application preferences
    ResultHandler
    Interface to pass to Bit6 methods in order to get response about the result.

    Controller class for RTC connection
